scripts.setup: yarn install && yarn submodule-update && yarn extract-wasm-dependencies
scripts.clean:win32: rd /s /q compiled & rd /s /q "dependencies/conway-geom/bin/release" & del /q "dependencies/conway-geom/Dist/*.map" && del /q "dependencies/conway-geom/Dist/*.js" & yarn "clean-conway_geom"
scripts.clean:darwin: rm -rf compiled && rm -rf dependencies/conway-geom/bin/release && rm -rf dependencies/conway-geom/Dist/*.{map,js} && yarn clean-conway_geom
scripts.clean:default: rm -rf compiled && rm -rf dependencies/conway-geom/bin/release && rm -rf dependencies/conway-geom/Dist/*.{map,js} && yarn clean-conway_geom
scripts.build: yarn clean && yarn update-version && yarn build-all-release-node && yarn build-all-release-node-MT && yarn build-all-release-web && yarn build-all-release-web-MT && yarn bundle-examples
scripts.build-single-thread: yarn clean && yarn update-version && yarn build-all-release-node && yarn build-all-release-web
scripts.build-MT: yarn clean && yarn update-version && yarn build-all-release-node-MT && yarn build-all-release-web-MT
scripts.build-web: yarn clean && yarn update-version && yarn build-all-release-web
scripts.build-node: yarn clean && yarn update-version && yarn build-all-release-node
scripts.build-web-MT: yarn clean && yarn update-version && yarn build-all-release-web-MT
scripts.build-node-MT: yarn clean && yarn update-version && yarn build-all-release-node-MT
scripts.build-and-serve: yarn build-incremental && yarn build-conway_geom-web && yarn build-conway_geom-web-MT && yarn serve
scripts.build-GHA-all: yarn run build-GHA-base ConwayGeomWasmNode ConwayGeomWasmNodeMT ConwayGeomWasmWeb ConwayGeomWasmWebMT && yarn bumpMinor
scripts.build-codex-all: yarn run build-codex-base ConwayGeomWasmNode ConwayGeomWasmNodeMT ConwayGeomWasmWeb ConwayGeomWasmWebMT && yarn bumpMinor
scripts.bundle-examples: yarn bundle-browser && yarn bundle-cli && yarn bundle-validator && shx chmod +x ./compiled/examples/*-bundled.cjs; cd compiled; rm Dist; cp -r dependencies/conway-geom/Dist .
scripts.build-rebuild: yarn clean-tsc && yarn code-gen && yarn build-incremental
scripts.bumpMinor: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const pkg = JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('package.json')); let [major, minor, patch] = pkg.version.split('.'); minor = parseInt(minor, 10) + 1; pkg.version = [major, minor, patch].join('.'); fs.writeFileSync('package.json', JSON.stringify(pkg, null, 2)); console.log('New version:', pkg.version);"
scripts.build-conway_geom-node:darwin: cd ./dependencies/conway-geom/ && ./build_osx.sh release wasmNode && mkdir -p Dist && cp ./bin/release/* Dist/ && cp ConwayGeomWasm.d.ts Dist/ && mkdir -p ../../compiled/dependencies/conway-geom/Dist && cp ./bin/release/* ../../compiled/dependencies/conway-geom/Dist
scripts.build-conway_geom-node:win32: cd .\dependencies\conway-geom\ && call .\build_win.bat release wasmNode && (if not exist Dist (mkdir Dist)) && xcopy .\bin\release\* Dist\ /Y/r && copy /Y ConwayGeomWasm.d.ts Dist\ && (if not exist ..\..\compiled\dependencies\conway-geom\Dist (mkdir ..\..\compiled\dependencies\conway-geom\Dist)) && xcopy .\bin\release\* ..\..\compiled\dependencies\conway-geom\Dist\ /Y/r
scripts.build-conway_geom-node:default: cd ./dependencies/conway-geom/ && ./build_osx.sh release wasmNode && mkdir -p Dist && cp ./bin/release/* Dist/ && cp ConwayGeomWasm.d.ts Dist/ && mkdir -p ../../compiled/dependencies/conway-geom/Dist && cp ./bin/release/* ../../compiled/dependencies/conway-geom/Dist
scripts.build-conway_geom-web:darwin: cd ./dependencies/conway-geom/ && ./build_osx.sh release wasmWeb && mkdir -p Dist && cp ./bin/release/* Dist/ && cp ConwayGeomWasm.d.ts Dist/ && mkdir -p ../../compiled/dependencies/conway-geom/Dist && cp ./bin/release/* ../../compiled/dependencies/conway-geom/Dist
scripts.build-conway_geom-web:win32: cd .\dependencies\conway-geom\ && call .\build_win.bat release wasmWeb && (if not exist Dist (mkdir Dist)) && xcopy .\bin\release\* Dist\ /Y/r && copy /Y ConwayGeomWasm.d.ts Dist\ && (if not exist ..\..\compiled\dependencies\conway-geom\Dist (mkdir ..\..\compiled\dependencies\conway-geom\Dist)) && xcopy .\bin\release\* ..\..\compiled\dependencies\conway-geom\Dist\ /Y/r
scripts.build-conway_geom-web:default: cd ./dependencies/conway-geom/ && ./build_osx.sh release wasmWeb && mkdir -p Dist && cp ./bin/release/* Dist/ && cp ConwayGeomWasm.d.ts Dist/ && mkdir -p ../../compiled/dependencies/conway-geom/Dist && cp ./bin/release/* ../../compiled/dependencies/conway-geom/Dist
